name: I am breaking down your walls
name_original: I am breaking down your walls
description:
Punch down those walls!

Made for the Mini Jam 82: Doodle

CONTROLS:
  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift: Sprint
  • Left Click: Punch
  • Right Click: Zoom
  • Esc: Close
  • Tab: Show Mouse
    • Click again: Hide mouse
  • F11 / Alt+Enter: Fullscreen

Break all the walls to reveal the trophies! Don't look through the hole.

CREDITS:

Google: Images

Youtube: tutorials lol

Sea: Everything else

The wall dwellers: The drawings on the walls
